entities.name: phlegm

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Mrs. Weasley's name, and she is referred to as 'she' indicating that Ginny is a female person.

relationships.description: Harry likes Phlegm, as mentioned in the text.
Ron is afraid of Ginny, as he gets punch-drunk and shakes his head when she jumps out unexpectedly.
